description: Detects PowerShell creating a binary executable or a script file.
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: False positives will differ depending on the environement and scripts used. Apply additional filters accordingly.
name: Potential Binary Or Script Dropper Via PowerShell
query: ((process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe") AND file.path.text:("*.bat" OR "*.chm" OR "*.cmd" OR "*.com" OR "*.dll" OR "*.exe" OR "*.hta" OR "*.jar" OR "*.js" OR "*.ocx" OR "*.scr" OR "*.sys" OR "*.vbe" OR "*.vbs" OR "*.wsf")) AND (NOT (((file.path.text:"C\:\\Users\\*" AND file.path.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*" AND file.path.text:("*.dll" OR "*.exe"))) OR ((file.path.text:"C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" AND file.path.text:("*.dll" OR "*.exe"))))))
